paper.title: A programmable two-qubit quantum processor in silicon

circuits_cqasm.bell_PhiPlus_ZZ:
version 3.0

qubit[9] q
bit[9] b

// Bell state: |Phi+> = (|00>+|11>)/sqrt(2)
// Measure in ZZ basis

H q[4]
CNOT q[4], q[6]


b = measure q
circuits_cqasm.bell_PhiPlus_XX:
version 3.0

qubit[9] q
bit[9] b

// Bell state: |Phi+> = (|00>+|11>)/sqrt(2)
// Measure in XX basis

H q[4]
CNOT q[4], q[6]

H q[4]
H q[6]

b = measure q
circuits_cqasm.bell_PhiPlus_YY:
version 3.0

qubit[9] q
bit[9] b

// Bell state: |Phi+> = (|00>+|11>)/sqrt(2)
// Measure in YY basis

H q[4]
CNOT q[4], q[6]

Sdag q[4]
H q[4]
Sdag q[6]
H q[6]

b = measure q
circuits_cqasm.bell_PhiMinus_ZZ:
version 3.0

qubit[9] q
bit[9] b

// Bell state: |Phi-> = (|00>-|11>)/sqrt(2)
// Measure in ZZ basis

X q[4]
H q[4]
CNOT q[4], q[6]


b = measure q

circuits_cqasm.bell_PsiPlus_ZZ:
version 3.0

qubit[9] q
bit[9] b

// Bell state: |Psi+> = (|01>+|10>)/sqrt(2)
// Measure in ZZ basis

H q[4]
CNOT q[4], q[6]
X q[6]


b = measure q

version 3.0

qubit[9] q
bit[9] b

// Bell state: |Psi+> = (|01>+|10>)/sqrt(2)

H q[4]
CNOT q[4], q[6]
X q[6]

H q[4]
H q[6]

b = measure q

circuits_cqasm.dj_constant_0:
version 3.0

qubit[9] q
bit[9] b

// Deutsch-Josza: f(x)=0 (constant)

X q[6]
H q[4]
H q[6]
H q[4]

b = measure q
circuits_cqasm.dj_constant_1:
version 3.0

qubit[9] q
bit[9] b

// Deutsch-Josza: f(x)=1 (constant)

X q[6]
H q[4]
H q[6]
X q[6]
H q[4]

b = measure q
circuits_cqasm.dj_balanced_id:
version 3.0

qubit[9] q
bit[9] b

// Deutsch-Josza: f(x)=x (balanced)

X q[6]
H q[4]
H q[6]
CNOT q[4], q[6]
H q[4]

b = measure q
circuits_cqasm.dj_balanced_not:
version 3.0

qubit[9] q
bit[9] b

// Deutsch-Josza: f(x)=NOT(x) (balanced)

X q[6]
H q[4]
H q[6]
X q[4]
CNOT q[4], q[6]
X q[4]
H q[4]

b = measure q
circuits_cqasm.grover_target_00:
version 3.0

qubit[9] q
bit[9] b

// Grover: Search for |00>

H q[4]
H q[6]
X q[4]
X q[6]
H q[6]
CNOT q[4], q[6]
H q[6]
X q[4]
X q[6]
H q[4]
H q[6]
X q[4]
X q[6]
H q[6]
CNOT q[4], q[6]
H q[6]
X q[4]
X q[6]
H q[4]
H q[6]

b = measure q

H q[6]
X q[4]
H q[4]
H q[6]
X q[4]
X q[6]
H q[6]
CNOT q[4], q[6]
H q[6]
X q[4]
X q[6]
H q[4]
H q[6]

b = measure q

H q[6]
